titleStmt.title: Coryates crambe, or his colwort tvvise sodden and now serued in with other macaronicke dishes, as the second course to his Crudities.
titleStmt.author: Coryate, Thomas, ca. 1577-1617.

notesStmt.note: Signatures: a⁴ b⁴ A-D⁴ ² D⁴ E-H⁴ (-H4).
The first two leaves of quire ² D are signed D3, D4.
Variant: unsigned leaf of verses by Hugh Holland inserted after b4.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
